name: Dr. Md. Shuktarul Islam (Tamim)
specialty: Neurology (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Headache, Epilepsy, Paralysis, Stroke) Specialist
address: Address: House # 79/1E, Demra Road, Bibir Bagicha, Uttar Jatrabari, DhakaVisiting Hour: 6pm to 10pm (Closed: Thu & Friday)Appointment: +8809610009626
about: Dr. Md. Shuktarul Islam passed SSC in 2000 from DGT High School, Daulatpur, Kushtia and HSC in 2002 from Kushtia Govt. College, Kushtia. He completed MBBS from Faridpur Medical College, Faridpur in 2008. He joined in government service in 2010. He was posted in Agailjhara UHC, Barishal. Then he worked in Dhaka Medical College Hospital, Dhaka. He Passed MD in Neurology in 2021 from Sir Salimullah Medical College under BSMMU. He also did certificate course CCD (diabetology) from BIRDEM, Dhaka. He also did fellowships training in Clinical Neurophysiology (NCS and EMG) from NINS. He also did training on Emergency Management from Mahidol University, Thiland and He also did training on Headache and Stroke from Singapore. He is now working as Neurologist in National Institute of Neurosciences and Hospital, Agargoan, Dhaka. He has published various scientific papers in various national and international journals. He has special interest in Stroke Medicine, Headache, Epilepsy, Neuromuscular and Movement Disorder.

name: Dr. Md. Meraj Uddin Mollah
address: Address: Plot # 81, Block # E, Bashundhara R/A, DhakaVisiting Hour: 9pm to 5pm (Closed: Friday)Appointment: 10678
about: Dr. Md. Meraj Uddin Mollah completed his MBBS in 2003 from the topmost medical college of Bangladesh (Dhaka Medical College) and later joined the MS Orthopaedic Surgery course at the National Institute of Traumatology and Orthopaedic Rehabilitation (NITOR) formerly known as Pongu Hospital in 2006. He also had brilliant results in HSC and SSC securing 4th and 6th positions respectively in the combined merit list. He completed his MS (Ortho) course in 2010 at the age of 32. He was the youngest Orthopaedic Surgeon while obtaining an MS (Ortho) Degree. He has worked in different capacities in government hospitals in his career under the Ministry of Health (BCS Health). Dr. Md. Meraj Uddin Mollah is an expert in Ilizarov and all kinds of Adult and Paediatric Deformity Correction Surgery. With the technique numerous unsolved Orthopaedic problems can be easily solved, previously thought impossible or very difficult. Numerous limbs have been saved with this surgery which would otherwise require amputation. He is efficiently and successfully treating Orthopaedic patients for the last 15 years and has performed more than 10000 Ilizarov surgeries.

name: Dr. A.M. Rejaus Satter
specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Spinal Cord Surgery) Specialist
address: Address: 8/F, Kazi Nuruzzaman Road, West Panthapath, DhakaVisiting Hour: 10am to 1pm & 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday)Appointment: 10616
about: Dr. A M Rejaus Satter graduated from Mymensingh Medical College. He obtained FCPS from BCPS and MS on Neurosurgery from Dhaka Medical College under BSMMU. He worked in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital and Dhaka Medical College & Hospital during his postgraduate training. He has been exposed to all ranges of cranial emergencies starting from trauma to intracerebral hematomas and strokes; entire ranges of emergency spinal decompression, stabilization and fusion; full spectrum of routine cases like brain tumors (supra and infratentorial, intra or extra axial), trans-sphenoidal surgery for sellar – suprasellar tumors, spinal tumors; congenital and pediatric neurosurgical disorders; degenerative spine diseases; endoscopic neurosurgical procedures; vascular disorders like aneurysms and AVMs. He has multiple publications in national and international journals.

name: Asst. Prof. Dr. Habib Imtiaz Ahmed
address: Address: 77/A, East Rajabazar, West Panthapath, DhakaVisiting Hour: 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday)Appointment: +8801701777782
about: Dr. Habib Imtiaz Ahmad is an expert, dynamic rheumatologist of Bangladesh. He is working as an Assistant professor in the department of Rheumatology of Enam Medical College, Savar, Dhaka and consultant rheumatologist at BRB hospital, Panthapath, Dhaka. Dr. Imtiaz is a very knowledgeable and skilled doctor. He is a graduate of Sir Salimullah Medical College and a member of Royal College of Physician of the United Kingdom. He completed his master degree in rheumatology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University. He is an expert rheumatologist and has special interest in managing Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Spondyloarthritis (SpA), Psoriatic Arthritis, Osteoarthritis (OA), Gout, Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE), Systemic Sclerosis,Anti Phospholipid Syndrome, Sjogren syndrome, Myositis, Vasculitis, Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis and different loco- regional pain. He has expertise in administering intra-articular injection, different kind of biologics, musculoskeletal ultrasound. He is one of the lead nailfoldcapillaroscopy experts of Bangladesh. Dr. Imtiaz is a very empathetic and altruistic doctor while managing patients. He is humane, honest and respectful to his patients.

name: Prof. Dr. Md. Kamrul Islam
address: Address: House No # 32, Road No # 03, Shyamoli, Dhaka - 1207Visiting Hour: 2pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Mon & Wed) & 2pm to 4.30pm (Tue, Thu & Fri)Appointment: +8801777685821
about: Dr. Kamrul Islam is a Kidney transplant surgeon and urologist who won the Independence Award in 2022 for his contribution. He has been performing kidney transplants free of cost for the last decade, along with providing his patients follow-up services. After retiring as an assistant professor of the National Institute of Kidney Diseases and Urology in 2011, Dr. Kamrul Islam took personal initiative to establish CKD & Urology Hospital. The institution has now become a place of trust and affection for kidney patients across the country. Kidney transplant procedures here are carried out at the small cost of two lakh and ten thousand takas only. Dr. Kamrul Islam charges no money for this complicated procedure. They even provide follow-up care free of charge for patients for several months after the procedure. Professor Dr. Kamrul and his team have transplanted almost one thousand kidneys so far, with a success rate of 96 percent.

name: Assoc. Prof. Dr. Aslam Almehdi
specialty: Dental Implant, Dental & Orofacial Pain, Oral Cancer, Cleft Lip & Palate Surgery, Periodontal Plastic Surgery, Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery, Periodontal Plastic & Maxillofacial Surgeon
qualifications: Ph.D (Tokyo), MS (Korea), BDS (DU), FIAOO (UK), FICD (USA), Postdoc (Australia)
address: Address: House # 78/E, Road # 12, Banani, Dhaka-1213Visiting Hour: 10am to 9pm (Closed: Friday)Appointment: +8801311129952
about: Dr. Aslam Almehdi obtained his BDS degree in Dental Surgery from the Dhaka Dental College & Hospital, Faculty of Medicine under University of Dhaka and Post Graduate Training in Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery from the Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University. He received his MS degree in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery & Medicine from the Kyungpuk National University Graduate School of Dentistry in South Korea and PhD degree in Periodontics / Periodontology (Periodontal Plastic Surgery) from Tokyo Medical & Dental University. He also completed postgraduate research training in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from Ehime University School of Medicine, Japan and training in Oral and Maxillofacial Medicine from Eastman Dental Institute University of London, UK and Postdoctoral Fellow in Advanced Periodontal Plastic Surgery from James Cook University, Australia. He is a Fellow of the International Academy of Oral Oncology, UK and International College of Dentistry in the USA. He attended the annual meeting and satellite symposium of the British Society of Oral & Maxillofacial Pathology and the British Society of Oral Medicine at St. Catherine’s College, University of Oxford. Currently he is working as Associate Professor in Delta Medical College & Hospital Dental Unit. Assoc. Prof. Dr. Aslam Almehdi is treating medical and dental patients including Root Canal, Crown & Bridge, Dental Implant, Dental & Orofacial Pain, Oral Cancer, Oral Trauma, Oral Cysts & Tumors, Birth Defects, Cleft Lip & Palate, TMJ Disorder, Gum Diseases and all types of Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery, Periodontal Plastic Surgery including Orthodontics and General Dentistry. He has published a number of medical and dental papers in national and international journals.

name: Prof. Dr. B.A.K Azad
specialty: Root Canal Treatment, Orthodontic Braces, Dental Implant & Crown Bridge
address: Address: House # 18/A, Road # 6, Dhanmondi Plaza (2nd Floor), Opposite to Gonoshasthaya Nagar Hospital, Mirpur Road, DhanmondiVisiting Hour: 4pm to 9pm (Friday - On Appointment)Appointment: +8801715157722
about: Dr. Azad completed his MCPS from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons. Then in 1998, he took his MDS (Master in Dental Surgery) in prosthetic dentistry from the University of London. He is also a fellow of International college of Ptosthodontists (FICP), America. In Bangladesh Dr. Azad started his professional career by joining Bangladesh Civil Service Health Cadre in 1985. After serving in the different levels he became a professor & head of Orhtodontics of Dhaka Dental College and hospital. Dr. Azad also served as a postgraduate trainee in Eastman Dental Hospital, London, UK. He also served as a Principal of Dhaka Dental College, the only government owned Dental College in Bangladesh and also served as a Director, (Dental) at Directorate General of Health Services (DGHS), Ministry of health and family welfare. Now he is serving as a Focal Point (Consultant) in World Health Organization (WHO).

name: Prof. Dr. Md. Ruhul Amin
address: Address: Room # 3/3 (Level 4), House # 50, Road # 9/A, Satmasjid Road, Dhanmandi, DhakaVisiting Hour: 5pm to 9pm (Sat, Mon & Wed)Appointment: +8801817541005
about: Dr. Md. Ruhul Amin is a one of the best dentist in Dhaka, Bangladesh. He completed Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) in the year 1987 from Dhaka Dental College. He obtained post graduate Diploma in Applied Nutrition and Dietetics (DAND) from Institute of Nutrition and Food Science of the University of Dhaka in 1989. He obtained post graduate Diploma in Dental Surgery (DDS) from the Institute of Post Graduate Medicine and Research (IPGMR) Dhaka. He later completed Master of Surgery (MS) degree in Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery in 2005 from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU). He started his private dental practice at Rampura in 1987 and from 2018 he also started practicing at Satmasjid Road Dhanmodi, Dhaka. After passing the 9th BCS examination Prof. Ruhul Amin started his career as a Dental Surgeon. He was posted in Upazilla Health Complex such as Ishwargonj, Mymensingh and Bhairab, Kishoregonj. He started his teaching career at Dhaka Dental College he also taught Chittagong Medical College and Shaheed Suhrawardi Medical College at present he is posted at Dhaka Medical College as the Professor and Head of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery. Prof. Md Ruhul Amin is now the President of Bangladesh Association of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons (BAMOS). He is also a Councilor of Asian Association of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons (AAOMS), and International Association of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons (IAOMS).

name: Dr. Md. Shayedat Ullah
specialty: Diabetes, Thyroid & Hormone & Metabolic Diseases Specialist
qualifications: MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MACP (USA), MACE (USA), MD (Endocrinology & Metabolism) (BSMMU)
address: Address: 32, Bir Uttam Shafiullah Sarak (Green Road), Dhanmondi, DhakaVisiting Hour: 6.30pm to 10pm (Closed: Thu & Friday)Appointment: +8801987851666
about: Dr. Md. Shayedat Ullah passed MBBS from Sher-E-Bangla Medical College under University of Dhaka in 2011. He joined Bangladesh civil service (BCS health cadre) in 2014. He then deputed to MD residency program (5 year course) at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) and achieved MD (Doctor of Medicine) in Endocrinology and Metabolism in 2021. He is now working as an Endocrinologist (Diabetes, Thyroid and Hormone specialist) in the department of Diabetes and Endocrinology at Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn and Plastic Surgery, Shahbag, Dhaka. He is very active in clinical, academic and research activities. Recently he received membership from American College of Physicians (MACP-USA) and American Association of Clinical Endocrinology (MACE-USA). He is also the General and life member of Association of Clinical Endocrinologist and Diabetologist of Bangladesh (ACEDB) and Bangladesh Endocrine Society (BES). His areas of concern are in the field of management of Diabetes, Specially of uncontrolled Diabetes, young onset, pregnancy related diabetes and its complications, all kinds of thyroid hormone disorders, obesity and metabolic disorders including Fatty liver, weight loss, Hormone related menstrual irregularities including PCOS, perimenopausal syndrome / Hot flash, short stature and delayed puberty including Growth Hormone deficiency, Micropenis, infertility, gynaecomastia (male breast enlargement), sexual dysfunction, osteoporosis, calcium, mineral, and Vit D deficiency disorder, Endocrine hypertension, Hypothalamo-pituitary and Adrenal disorder.

name: Dr. Md. Bahauddin Malik
specialty: Eye Specialist, Phaco and Cataract Surgeon
address: Address: 32, Rabindra Sarani, Sector – 7, Uttara, Dhaka – 1230Visiting Hour: 9am to 3pm (Closed: Friday)Appointment: +8801787681500
about: Dr. Md. Bahauddin Malik is a Eye Specialist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), DO (EYE), MS (Vienna). He is a well known cataract surgeon who performed more than 50,000 surgeries through various procedures such as ICCE, ECCE, SICS and PHACO during his tenure. He received hands-on-training on SICS from GM Eye Hospital, Mettupalayam, Coimbatore, India in 1999 and PHACO surgeries from NIO, Dhaka in 2005. In addition to national, he attended International conferences held at New Delhi, Nairobi and Dubai in 1986, 1990 and 2004 respectively and various Regional conferences in India, Singapore and Thailand. He is a life member of American Medical Society of Vienna, All India Ophthalmological Society, Ophthalmological Society of Bangladesh, Bangladesh Community Ophthalmological Society and Bangladesh Medical Association.

name: Dr. Lutful Aziz
specialty: Anesthesia, Pain Management, & Critical Care Medicine Specialist
address: Address: Plot # 81, Block # E, Bashundhara R/A, DhakaVisiting Hour: 9am to 5pm (Closed: Friday)Appointment: 10678
about: Dr. Lutful Aziz graduated from Dhaka Medical College in January, 1985. In 1990, he went to Okayama to do PhD in Anaesthesia and Pain Medicine under the Government of Japan Scholarship and he completed his PhD degree in 1995. After returning back to Bangladesh, he completed Fellowship in Anaesthesia (FCPS) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 1997. Prior to his joining Evercare Hospital as a Consultant, he was Associate Professor in Banghabandhu Sheikh and was the Academic Coordinator of the Post Graduate Studies of Department of Anaesthesia, Analgesia and Intensive Care Medicine. Mujib Medical University University Medical School University  During his career he has travelled to many countries to attend International Congresses in Anaesthesia, ICU and Pain Medicine, and has delivered more than 75 lectures as an Invited Speaker. To his credit he has more than 45 publications in different national and international journals. He is in the Editorial Committee of four national and International journals. He is the Founder Member and current President of Bangladesh Society for Study of Pain.  His areas of expertise are different techniques of modern anaesthesia like General Anaesthesia, Neuro Anaesthesia, Paediatric Anaesthesia, and other disciplines of anaesthesia. He is an expert on Obstetric Anaesthesia and Labour Analgesia. His special interest is Pain Medicine – dealing with regional blocks for different cancer and chronic pains.

about: Dr. S.M Shahidul Islam is the Pioneer acupuncture doctor in Bangladesh who has been helping patients improve their health and well-being for many years. He has successfully treated thousands of patients who have suffered from various painful diseases and ailments. Dr. S.M Shahidul Islam is a true pioneer personality and an Acupuncture specialist who introduced us to this heterogeneous treatment system of Acupuncture. He acknowledges this acupuncture treatment with long experience. With his deft hands, a new horizon of acupuncture unfolded. Acupuncture is a popular medical procedure in Bangladesh, and has been growing in popularity over the past few years. His long-standing expertise in acupuncture has been successfully treating patients for many years.

name: Dr. Md. Faizul Islam
address: Address: 32, Bir Uttam Shafiullah Sarak (Green Road), Dhanmondi, DhakaVisiting Hour: 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Tuesday)Appointment: +8801644398608
about: Dr. Md. Faizul Islam is an Adult and Paediatric Cardiovascular Surgeon who was endowed with fellowship in congenital Cardiac Surgery from Amrita Institute of Medical Science (AIMS), Kochi, Kerala, India. Sir HN Reliance Foundation Hospital and Research Institute Mumbai, India. He also obtained fellowship from Fortis Escorts Heart Institute, New Delhi India. He is an expert in the field of any type of Adult (CABG, Valve Replacement and Repair) and Congenital Cardiac Surgery including Surgical Correction of hole in the heart (ASD, VSD, PDA, AP Window), Surgical Correction of Complex Congenital Cardiac defects (total correction of TOF), different modalities of treatment of Coarctation of Aorta, single ventricle morphology, different types of palliative shunts (BT, MBT, BDG, Potts shunts, Waterston shunts), different types of total Anomalous Pulmonary Venous connection (TAPVC), AV Canal defects and Surgery for Ebstein’s Anomaly of Tricuspid Valve. He is one of the expert in doing MICS Paediatric Cardiac Surgery especially trans axillary approach of doing open Heart Surgery. He is regularly doing Beating Heart Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (CABG) and Mitral, Aortic, Tricuspid Valve repair and replacement.

name: Prof. Dr. Gopen Kumar Kundu
address: Address: 32, Bir Uttam Shafiullah Sarak (Green Road), Dhanmondi, DhakaVisiting Hour: 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Thu & Friday)Appointment: +8801726937871
about: Dr. Gopen Kumar Kundu passed MBBS from Sir Salimullah Medical College, Dhaka in January 1997, and passed Diploma in child Health (DCH) in July, 2001 from BSMMU. He has been completed fellowship in Paediatrics (FCPS) on January 2010. Then he obtained Doctor of Medicine (MD) degree in Paediatric Neurology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU). He joined as Assistant Professor in Paediatric Neurology in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University July 2010. He worked as Associate Professor in Paediatric Neurology since 2014 to 2019. Now he worked as Professor and Chairman of Department of Paediatric Neurology, BSMMU. Beside this he has been serving as Director of Autism and NDDs Cell in MOH&FW (HSD) since 2014. By this time he underwent for Clinical fellowship for Paediatric Neurology at NIMHANS, Bangalore & PGI, Chandigarh, India and South Korea. He participated many international child neurology conferences like Japan, Taiwan, Bhutan, South Korea etc. Professor Kundu published a book titled “OSPE Paediatrics” in 2017 that is the only OSPE book of Paediatrics in Bangladesh. He has more than 40 articles in national and international journals & has been actively involved in research, teaching & other academic activities of BSMMU.
